EmailTemplate.name: HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-FORUM-REGISTRATION.Invite #2 HHS (New speakers announced fo
EmailTemplate.subject: New speakers announced for Forum 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 18 – 19, 2023 | Boston, MA
Prepare to be inspired
Join us <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content&utm_term&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-FORUM-REGISTRATION&utm_campaign_id=%2F]]>—and hundreds of others who are changing the healthcare experience—at Forum 2023. As our guest, there’s no cost for you to attend our in-person event in Boston for two days of content focused on the transformative power of virtual care. • Explore timely topics including virtual nursing, health equity, clinical quality, the regulatory landscape and more • Hear from Jefferson Health, WellSpan and others on the increasingly critical role of virtual care • Share best practices on virtual and hybrid care delivery with a global community
Featured speakers:
Vipul Bhatia, MD Associate Chief Medical Officer for Post-Acute and Continuing Care Services WellSpan Health
Judd Hollander, MD Senior Vice President, Healthcare Delivery Innovation Thomas Jefferson University
Kelly Wage Vice President, Consumer Engagement and Market Solutions Blue Cross Blue Shield of South Carolina
Jessica Rosales Total Rewards Vice President, North America SAP
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
